name: placental site trophoblastic tumor
definition: A choriocarcinoma that is characterized by low beta-hCG levels and arises from neoplastic transformation of intermediate trophoblastic cells. [url:https\://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/14614893]

clinicalTrials.title: Nivolumab and Ipilimumab in Treating Patients With Rare Tumors
